Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1979...
Traded from St. Louis to Texas on 3/2/1979 (Going to STL: 2B M. Woodard. Going to TEX: P R. Citarella)...
Injured on 5/11/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 8 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/14/1983...
Injured on 6/15/1986 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
